messages.agent_message: Would you like to create a new account?
What account type would you like to create?
messages.user_message: I want to create a retirement fund account.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Which account would you like to use?
Account retirement fund was successfully created with starter funds transferred from chequing.
Would you like to e-transfer any money to your contacts?
No problem! No e-transfers will be sent.
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: I want to pay off my gas bill.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to use?
Ok, I'm paying your gas bill from your savings account.
Would you like to request money from a contact?
Which contact would you like to request money from and how much?
messages.user_message: Please send a request for Sandra to send me 5000.

messages.agent_message: Ok, I'm requesting a transfer of 5000 from Sandra. I will let you know when the transfer goes through.
Would you like to transfer any money today?
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
